Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Plugins

Classes

  Type Name Description
ANetworkPredictionExtrasCharacter Sample pawn that uses UCharacterMotionComponent.  
ANetworkPredictionExtrasCharacter_MockAbility Example subclass of ANetworkPredictionExtrasCharacter that uses the MockAbility simulation.  
ANetworkPredictionExtrasFlyingPawn Sample pawn that uses UFlyingMovementComponent.  
ANetworkPredictionExtrasFlyingPawn_MockAbility Example subclass of ANetworkPredictionExtrasFlyingPawn that uses the MockAbility simulation.  
ANetworkPredictionExtrasGameMode    
ANetworkPredictionExtrasGameState    
FBaseMovementSimulation This provides a base for movement related simulations: moving an "UpdatedComponent" around the world.  
FCharacterMotionAuxState Auxiliary state that is input into the simulation.  
FCharacterMotionInputCmd State the client generates.  
FCharacterMotionSimulation    
FCharacterMotionSyncState State we are evolving frame to frame and keeping in sync.  
FFloorTestResult Data about the floor for walking movement, used by CharacterMovementComponent.  
FFlyingMovementAuxState Auxiliary state that is input into the simulation.  
FFlyingMovementInputCmd State the client generates.  
FFlyingMovementSimulation    
FFlyingMovementSyncState State we are evolving frame to frame and keeping in sync.  
FMockAbilityAuxState    
FMockAbilityBlinkActivateCue Cue for blink activation (the moment the ability starts)  
FMockAbilityBlinkCue Cue for blink (the moment the teleport happens)  
FMockAbilityBlinkCue_ReplicatedNonPredicted    
FMockAbilityBlinkCue_ReplicatedXOrPredicted    
FMockAbilityBlinkCue_Strong    
FMockAbilityBlinkCue_Weak    
FMockAbilityCueSet The set of Cues the MockAbility simulation will invoke.  
FMockAbilityInputCmd Mock Ability Simulation This is meant to illustrate how a higher level simulation can build off an existing one.  
FMockAbilityPhysicsGunFireCue    
FMockAbilitySimulation    
FMockAbilitySyncState    
FMockAuxState Auxiliary state that is input into the simulation.  
FMockCharacterAbilityAuxState    
FMockCharacterAbilityInputCmd MockCharacterAbilitySimulation definition  
FMockCharacterAbilitySimulation    
FMockCharacterAbilitySyncState    
FMockCue A minimal Cue, emitted every 10 "totals" with a random integer as a payload.  
FMockCueSet Set of all cues the Mock simulation emits. Not strictly necessary and not that helpful when there is only one cue (but using since this is the example real simulations will want to use)  
FMockGrenadeExplodeCue    
FMockInputCmd State the client generates.  
FMockNetworkSimulation    
FMockPhysicsAuxState    
FMockPhysicsChargeCue    
FMockPhysicsCueSet    
FMockPhysicsGrenadeAuxState    
FMockPhysicsInputCmd Making this a blueprint type to that it can be filled out by BPs.  
FMockPhysicsJumpCue    
FMockPhysicsSimulation    
FMockRootMotionAuxState The aux state should hold state that does not frequently change.  
FMockRootMotionInputCmd This is an initial prototype of root motion in the Network Prediction system.  
FMockRootMotionReturnValue    
FMockRootMotionSimulation The actual NetworkPrediction simulation code that implements root motion movement (root motion evaluation itself is done via IMockRootMotionSourceMap but the actual 'how to move thing given a delta' is done here)  
FMockRootMotionStepParameters    
FMockRootMotionSyncState    
FMockSyncState State we are evolving frame to frame and keeping in sync.  
FParametricAuxState Auxiliary state that is input into the simulation.  
FParametricInputCmd State the client generates.  
FParametricMovementModelDef NetworkedSimulation Model type  
FParametricMovementSimulation The actual movement simulation  
FParametricSyncState State we are evolving frame to frame and keeping in sync.  
FRootMotionSourceCache    
FSimpleParametricMotion Extremely simple struct for defining parametric motion. This is editable in UParametricMovementComponent's defaults, and also used by the simulation code.  
FSpring    
IMockRootMotionSourceMap This is the interface into "things that actually provide root motion".  
INetworkPredictionExtrasModule    
IRootMotionSourceStore Interface for managing instantiated root motion source objects.  
TMockRootMotionSourceProxy Thing that goes in the aux state.  
UBaseMovementComponent Base component for movement.  
UCharacterMotionComponent ActorComponent for running CharacterMotion  
UFlyingMovementComponent ActorComponent for running FlyingMovement  
UMockCharacterAbilityComponent ActorComponent for running Mock Ability Simulation for CharacterMotion example  
UMockFlyingAbilityComponent ActorComponent for running Mock Ability Simulation  
UMockNetworkSimulationComponent ActorComponent for running a MockNetworkSimulation (implements Driver for the mock simulation)  
UMockPhysicsComponent ActorComponent for running MockPhysicsSimulation  
UMockPhysicsGrenadeComponent --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
UMockRootMotionComponent This component acts as the Driver for the FMockRootMotionSimulation It is essentially a standin for the movement component, and would be replaced by "new movement system" component.  
UMockRootMotionSource    
UMockRootMotionSource_Curve    
UMockRootMotionSource_Montage    
UMockRootMotionSource_MoveToLocation    
UMockRootMotionSourceClassMap    
UParametricMovementComponent ActorComponent for running basic Parametric movement.
